title: The Kapil Sharma gets a great start with this Bell Bottom actor
content: Kapil Sharma took to Instagram to share a photo of Akshay Kumar reaching for his feet on the sets of The Kapil Sharma Show. Both of them had hilarious ways of explaining the photo.Kapil Sharma took to Instagram to share a photo of Akshay Kumar reaching for his feet on the sets of The Kapil Sharma Show. Both of them had hilarious ways of explaining the photo.
excerpt: Kapil Sharma took to Instagram to share a photo of Akshay Kumar reaching for his feet on the sets of The Kapil Sharma Show. Both of them had hilarious ways of explaining the photo.Kapil Sharma took to Instagram to share a photo of Akshay Kumar reaching for his feet on the sets of The Kapil Sharma Show. Both of them had hilarious ways of explaining the photo.

title: The Kapil Sharma gets a great start with this Bell Bottom actor
content: Akshay Kumar will be seen as a guest on The Kapil Sharma Show. The actor will be seen promoting his film, Bell Bottom, on the comedy show. Recently, Kapil took to Instagram to share a photo from the sets of his show. Akshay can be seen reaching for his feet in the photo, which Kapil explained was for the success of Bell Bottom. Akshay had a solid response to that. The Kapil Sharma Show will premiere on August 21. The episode will mark Akshay Kumar’s 26th time on the show. In the photo shared by Kapil, Akshay can be seen bent down and reaching for the comedian’s feet. Kapil captioned the photo in Hindi, which translates to, “Popular movie actor Akshay Kumar taking blessings for his upcoming film Bell Bottom #fun #comedy #masti #tv #akshaykumar #tkss #thekapilsharmashow #shoot #happiness #laughter #comingsoon (sic).
excerpt: Kapil Sharma took to Instagram to share a photo of Akshay Kumar reaching for his feet on the sets of The Kapil Sharma Show. Both of them had hilarious ways of explaining the photo.
